on_destroy_add_hand_galian_beast.description: When destroyed, add Galian Beast to your hand.

on_destroy_add_hand_heatseeker_minion.description: When destroyed, add Heatseeker Minion to your hand.

on_destroy_add_hand_resurrected_amalgam.description: When destroyed add Resurrected Amalgam to your hand.

on_enfeebled_enemies_-4.description: When enfeebled, lower their power by 4.

on_lane_win_bonus_10.description: When you win the lane, receive a score bonus of 10.

on_lane_win_bonus_3.description: When you win the lane, receive a score bonus of 3.

on_lane_win_bonus_5.description: When you win the lane, receive a score bonus of 5.

on_play_add_hand_baby_grangalan.description: When played, add Baby Grangalan to your hand.

on_play_add_hand_cacneo_donberry.description: When played, add both Cacneo and Donberry to your hand.

on_play_add_hand_grangalan_junior.description: When played, add Grangalan Junior to your hand.

on_play_add_hand_tiny_bronco.description: When played, add the Tiny Bronco to your hand.

on_play_destroy_all.description: When played, destroy allied and enemy cards on affected tiles.

on_play_destroy_ally_and_replace.description: Destroy an allied card and replace it.

on_play_destroy_enemies.description: When played, destroy enemy cards on affected tiles.

on_play_expand_positions.description: Creates a surfeit of positions around it when played.

on_play_raise_positions_rank_2.description: When played, raise position ranks by 2.

on_play_raise_positions_rank_3.description: When played, raise positions ranks by 3.

on_play_replace_ally_lower_by_replaced.description: Replace an ally and lower the power of allied and enemy cards on affected tiles by the replaced ally's power.

on_play_replace_ally_raise_by_replaced.description: Replace an ally and raise the power of allied cards on affected tiles by the replaced ally's power.

on_play_spawn_diamond_dust.description: When played, spawn Diamond Dust in each of your empty positions.

on_play_spawn_elementals.description: When played, for each of your empty position, spawn an Elementals matching the number of Pawns there.

on_play_spawn_hype_johnnys.description: When played, for each of your empty position, spawn a Hype Johnnys matching the number of Pawns there.

on_power_reaches_7_allies_raise_2.description: When this card's power first reaches 7, raise the power of allied cards on affected tiles by 2.

on_round_end_lane_min_transfer.description: If this card is in play when the round ends, the lower of each lane's score is added to the victor's.

on_spawned_replaced_pawns_gain.description: When spawned, if this replaced 2 Pawns, this gains 2 power. If this replaced 3, this gains 4 power instead.
